semantic_identifier: [GOLD-191]: Add immutable access logs for issue objects and linked evidence
title: Add immutable access logs for issue objects and linked evidence

sections.text: Implement workspace-scoped access logging for reads/writes to issue objects, evidence snippets, and decision/status fields (including who/when/what and source IP/user agent where available). Store logs in an append-only table with retention aligned to workspace retention settings (referencing, not duplicating, GOLD-189). Expose an admin API/UI endpoint to search/filter logs by actor, issue, time range, and action for compliance review.
